channel.title: How to get rid of msg
channel.description: hey the client im using atm when u start it up it has like 4 messages saying go to this website etc were do i find and remove this

item.title: How to get rid of msg
item.dc:creator: @RippersRipped RippersRipped
item.description:
@RippersRipped wrote:

add // in front of the line.

Example.

sM("@gre@::help to get started!");

would be //sM("@gre@::help to get started!");

// means it doesn’t count. Try that.

Read full topic
item.source: How to get rid of msg

@xlogga123 wrote:

just delete or make another text :L

Read full topic

item.title: How to get rid of msg
item.dc:creator: @daved daved
item.description:
@daved wrote:

What i suggest is:

Get an easy source and try looking over the codes. When you don’t get something use the search button on this forum, it might help.

You don’t have to delete everything… there are some codes there that if they are deleted they will mess up all the clien.java.

Learn some java script first… learn where the things are and what you can do with thme…

Read full topic

item.title: How to get rid of msg
item.dc:creator: @XeloXoft XeloXoft
item.description:
@XeloXoft wrote:

Bloody hell! Its located in the file you run!
Ok so its a CMD File, right click and click edit.
it should say "START “WEBSITE”
Delete the whole phrase, and it must be pause at the end of of the paragraph.
